name: Puggle Plague
description:
SAVE THE PUGS!!!! A game made in a day ✨

Interactions are simple as jumping and walking.

Player Controls:

A and D for movement of the player

Space or W to jump

Space or W TWICE to double jump

Credits:

Game made in Unity by Clinton Thai

Art and everything by Clinton Thai

Sound Effects are from YouTube: "oof" and "bonk"
